CustomField.description: Created by: JA Purpose: Capture if an individual has consistent reliable high-speed internet access at home to better design classes and support services.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Do they have consistent and reliable access to high-speed internet at home?
CustomField.label: Reliable Internet Access?

value.fullName: Yes, I have consistent and reliable access to a high-speed internet connection at home

value.fullName: No, I do not have consistent and reliable access to a high-speed internet connection at home
